Gulf Harbour body in bag: Pair charged with offering indignity to body named as Kaixiao Liu and Lanyue Xiao https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gulf-harbour-body-in-bag-pair-charged-with-offering-indignity-to-body-named-as-kaixio-liu-and-lanyue-晓/JEOX3GDHN5AIHFZCVHBCRBUEF4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gulf-harbour-body-in-bag-pair-charged-with-offering-indignity-to-body-named-as-kaixio-liu-and-lanyue-晓/JEOX3GDHN5AIHFZCVHBCRBUEF4/ George BlockThe identity of the woman remains unconfirmed. Thu, 01 Aug 2024 05:35:29 +0000 Kaixio Liu and Lanyue Xiao appear in the North Shore District Court on July 1, 2024. They have been charged with “offering an indignity” to the remains of an unidentified woman found in the water off Gulf Harbour on March 12. Photo / Dean Purcell

Man who laughed as he murdered Christchurch sex worker refused parole https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-who-laughed-as-he-murdered-christchurch-sex-worker-refused-parole/CQJ5N7EYQJHYLDNT3O2L64R2K4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-who-laughed-as-he-murdered-christchurch-sex-worker-refused-parole/CQJ5N7EYQJHYLDNT3O2L64R2K4/ Anna LeaskPeter Waihape murdered the young mother in 2005 and was sentenced to life in prison. Thu, 01 Aug 2024 01:30:30 +0000 Peter Waihape was sentenced in the High Court at Christchurch to preventive detention and a minimum 18-year non-parole period for the murder, abduction and rape of a Christchurch prostitute in December 2005 and the abduction and rape of another woman a few days earlier.
